snippet.title: Chao Bandstand v1.3 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
v1.3 is out, includes several changes since the SAGE update a while ago. Mostly started as just adding in one thing and I figured I'd do a lot of smaller things to make it feel worthwhile. NOTE: this is just primarily for the N64 version since it's mostly optimization. PC version will most likely not get these updates. 

Download link:

N64 (v1.3): https://romhacking.com/hack/chao-bandstand
PC (v1.2.1): available through sm64pcbuilder2! Makes compiling it much easier now. https://sm64pc.info/sm64pcbuilder2/
